data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Agalega Islands, Mauritius to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Agalega Islands, Mauritius
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Agalega Islands unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Agalega Islands that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Agalega Islands words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Vingt Cinq
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Vingt Cinq, Agalega Islands, Mauritius.
Spirit, teach the 29 believers in Agalega Islands that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 300 citizens of Agalega Islands, Mauritius, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 29 believers in Agalega Islands, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.
